data.name: The #1 Show
data.summary: The #1 Show is a show about everything... except video games. We have enough shows for that. A show that was conceived after arguing while in a backyard pool over the best cereals, this is the end result... but is still a work in progress.

show_episodes.title: WHAT'S THE BEST PIZZA? | THE #1 SHOW
show_episodes.caption: SERIES PREVIEW - The #1 Show is a show about everything... except video games. We have enough shows for that. A show that was conceived after arguing while in a backyard pool over the best cereals, this is the end result... but is still a work in progress
show_episodes.description:

data.name: Available Now Podcast
data.summary: ScrewAttack's weekly gaming podcast hosted by Sean Hinz, Shaun Bolen and Sam Mitchell.

show_episodes.title: We're OBSESSED With Star Wars Battlefront | "Available Now" - NEW PODCAST!!
show_episodes.caption: If you love video games like we do you also like to talk about them. join Sean, Shaun and Sam as they chat about what they've been playing as well as show you their best moves of the weeks on "the most interactive video podcast on the internet"
show_episodes.description:
If you love video games like we do you also like to talk about them. join Sean, Shaun and Sam as they chat about what they've been playing as well as show you their best moves of the weeks on "the most interactive video podcast on the internet"
